name: My Little Prince Free
description:
Exploring the ancient castle with the little prince! What is the life of the people lived in the castle? Following the little prince, you may practice archery outside the castle, learn to cook in the kitchen, have a bath in the bedroom, feed the horses in the horse stable. Do not miss the armor shop. There are kinds of armors waiting for you to try.

With supper easy control and attractive animation, your kids will really enjoy the adventure in the castle. This open-ended play experience is perfect for toddlers and preschoolers.

Features
• Six key scenes, from the castle kitchen, the horse stable to the armor shop
• More than 60 fun animations to discover
• Great for toddlers and preschoolers, ages 2-5
• No third-party advertising

Parents, you can always count on the Yateland team to create safe and educational apps your children will love!
